name: simple-cms
description: A simple content management system built with Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL

scripts.db:migrate: ts-node -e "import { migrator } from './src/database/migrator'; migrator.runMigrations().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.db:seed: ts-node -e "import { seeder } from './src/database/seeder'; seeder.runSeeds().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.db:reset: ts-node -e "import { seeder } from './src/database/seeder'; import { migrator } from './src/database/migrator'; seeder.clearDatabase().then(() => migrator.runMigrations()).then(() => seeder.runSeeds()).then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.db:test:setup: NODE_ENV=test ts-node -e "import { initTestDb } from './src/database/test-config'; initTestDb().then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); })"
scripts.db:test:seed: NODE_ENV=test ts-node -e "import { seedTestDb } from './src/database/test-config'; seedTestDb('test-seed.sql').then(() => process.exit(0)).catch(err => { console.error(err); process.exit(1); })"
